name: Thalassa
description:
Thalassa is an atmospheric game where the player rides the underwater currents of an endless ocean in a speedy little submarine, weaving their way through dangerous waters, deeper and deeper into the abyss.

Goal of the game

Explore the dangerous deep sea. Survive as long as possible and reach the top of the leaderboards.

Controls

Move submarine: Arrow keys, WASD, Controller left stick or right stick

Confirm: Enter, Space, Controller A

Cancel: Backspace, Controller B

Pause: P or Esc
